item.title: [PI] dieing
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

ok nvm i found out that you can get pk points if you die from chaos ele like in wild … heres my applydead method
and its magepoints because pk points wouldnt save or work with shop

[code]public void applyDead() {
c.respawnTimer = 15;
c.isDead = false;

    if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
        //c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId);
        c.killerId = findKiller();
        Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
        if(o != null) {
            if(!(c.npcIndex > 0) && c.inPits == false){
            }
            if (c.killerId != c.playerId)
                o.sendMessage("You have defeated "+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+"!");
                            if(c.inWild()){
                                    o.magePoints += 5;
                                    o.sendMessage("You have received 5 PkPoints!!");
                            }
            c.playerKilled = c.playerId;
            if(o.duelStatus == 5) {
                o.duelStatus++;[/code]

Don’t fricking post if your not gonna help
